name: tree-sitter-allium
description: Tree-sitter grammar for the Allium language.

scripts.build: [ -f grammar.js ] && tree-sitter generate || echo 'grammar.js not yet written, skipping tree-sitter generate'
scripts.test: [ -f grammar.js ] && tree-sitter test || echo 'grammar.js not yet written, skipping tree-sitter test'
